listitem.para: Christian Perrier bubulle@debian.org is responsible for the i18n manual maintenance, daily monitoring of the i18n automation tools and should be contacted for any i18n related problems during the &d-i; development process.
Dennis Stampfer seppy@debian.org acts as backup for all these tasks and is more specifically in charge of the translation status scripts and pages.
Davide Viti zinosat@tiscali.it is responsible for the automated spellchecking tools and status pages.
Frans Pop fjp@debian.org is responsible for the Installation Guide and its localization effort.
